navbar.expire: Your account hasn't been verified and will expire in {{days}} day.
navbar.expire_plural: Your account hasn't been verified and will expire in {{days}} days.

signup.invalidEmail: The input is not valid E-mail!
signup.invalid: The email has already been taken.

error.500: Internal Error Server. Please contact the administrator!

login.errorContent:
Your account was not confirmed and has been locked out.
A new confirm request has been sent to your e-mail.
If you do not received the email reset message within a few minutes, please check you spam folder.

You can also try reseting your password in order to get reactivate your account.
login.error429: Too many attempts to log in! Try again in

reset.modal:
A password reset message was sent to the provided email address.

Please follow the instruction in the email to reset your password.

If you do not received the email reset message within a few minutes, please check you spam folder.

homePage.loggedIn:
This is your Home Screen
You are logged in as {{name}}!

dashPage.loggedIn:
This is your Admin Screen
You are logged in as {{name}}!

activation.try_resending_activation_code: Try resending the activation code below.
activation.successTitle: Your account has been activated successfully

resend.title: Send Activation Code
resend.successModalSubTitle: Activation code has successfully been sent to the email provided. If you do not received the email activation message within a few minutes, please check you spam folder.
resend.errorNotFound: No account was found with the email provided. Check whether the email you have entered is correct.
resend.errorAlreadySent: An activation email has already been sent to this email in less than an hour. Check your spam folder and whether email you have entered is correct or try again in an hour.
